title: League of Legends download won't work?
body:
So, whenever I try to download League of Ledends on my Mac OS, It doesn't download and instead brings me to a page that says: 

This site canâ€™t be reached
riotgamespatcher-a.akamaihd.net refused to connect.

I'm using Google Chrome, and Safari won't work either.

replies.body:
Can you try [**configuring your DNS**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) to Google's before trying to visit [**this page**](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload) to attempt the download again?

Let me know if this helped!
